ComicInfo.Title: Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
After the shocking events that befell Dash at the conclusion of the last issue, the Incredibles family find themselves in a situation theyve never been before. With the history of the mysterious Slow Burn revealed, the team look to take him down once and for all. However, Dash has to learn to focus his skills in a whole new way, which may not be as easy as it seems.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Jean-Claudio Vinci (a) & Dan Jackson (c) | 1 | B | Variant Cover | Kawaii Creative Studio | 2 |
